Thulsa's a past master of dark magics and his forces are disproportionately magic-heavy. The worst of the lot were the {@LinkCreature:27#22#Thulsan mystics} and {@LinkCreature:27#24#Thulsan sorcerers}, using their magics to torment the populace.

The time for retribution is upon us. Slay these fiends and return. Your reward will be substantial.

Your work is appreciated. By targeting the arcanists directly, we send a message that we will not tolerate their barbarism.

It's small comfort to the survivors, but a great boost to our morale.
